component.name: Live Background Removal Lite
component.summary: Live Background Removal Lite for OBS Studio
component.description: Live Background Removal Lite is a lightweight and easy-to-use plugin for OBS Studio that allows you to remove the background from your webcam feed without the need for a green screen. It uses advanced AI technology to accurately detect and remove the background, leaving you with a clean and professional look.

description.p: Thank you for using Background Removal Lite! Please report any issues or feedback.
This release adds unofficial Flatpak build instructions, improves documentation, and fixes installer links.

ul.li: Arch Linux PKGBUILD & Flatpak metadata updates.

description.p: This release adds support for Arch Linux packaging, includes a new Flatpak manifest, and brings several documentation and workflow improvements.

ul.li: Arch Linux Packaging Support: Added a PKGBUILD for easier building and installation on Arch Linux.
Flatpak Manifest Added: New experimental Flatpak manifests for easier packaging.
Documentation & Readme Improvements: Updated documentation to include Arch Linux instructions.
Workflow Improvements: CI workflow now triggers on both branch and tag pushes.

description.p: This update brings several improvements to build and testing workflows, a cleanup of legacy update checker code, and small quality-of-life fixes for both users and contributors. Major changes include renaming the project to "Background Removal Lite", removing the built-in update checker, and cleaning up the CMake and CI build processes. An unsupported PKGBUILD for Arch Linux has also been added.
